column3: ariana grande i was a liar i gave into the fire i know i should've fought it at least i'm being honest feel like a failure 'cause i know that i failed you i should've done you better 'cause you don't want a liar  and i know and i know and i know she gives you everything but boy i couldn't give it to you  kendji girac mon amour mon amour mon amour sans toi plus rien ne brille plus aucun rÃªve ne me tient debout  ariana grande so one last time i need to be the one who takes you home one more time i promise after that i'll let you go baby i don't care if you got her in your heart all i really care is you wake up in my arms one last time i need to be the one who takes you home  kendji girac tout seul je dÃ©rive si de ta peau tu me prives les minutes sont des annÃ©es quand le cÅ“ur se laisse aller viens on recommence on s'accorde une deuxiÃ¨me chance rattrapons le temps gÃ¢chÃ© arrÃªtons de nous cacher  mon amour mon amour mon amour j'pourrais changer d'avis mais tu resteras mon seul amour  ariana grande and i know and i know and i know that you got everything but i got nothing here without you baby  kendji girac oui attendsmoi si tu t'enfuis je suis juste un fantÃ´me juste un fantÃ´me attendsmoi sans toi je suis sans vie sans idÃ©aux je sais qu'on ne peut jamais remonter le temps pourquoi ne pas s'apprendre Ã  s'aimer au prÃ©sent  attendsmoi si tu t'enfuis je suis juste un fantÃ´me  ariana grande i know i should've fought it at least i'm being honest yeah but stay with me a minute i swear i'll make it worth it yeah 'cause i don't wanna be without you oh  so one last time i need to be the one who takes you home who takes you home babe one more time oh yeah i promise after that i'll let you go i promise that i'll let you go baby i don't care if you got her in your heart babe all i really care is you wake up in my arms oh one last time i need to be the one who takes you home yeah ooh  kendji girac attendsmoi si tu t'enfuis je suis juste un fantÃ´me
